sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from "react"; const Formulario = () => { const initialReserva = { nombres: "", apellidos: "", email: "", telefono: "", servicio: "", num_personas: "", fecha: "", terminos: "", }; const [form, setForm] = useState(initialReserva); const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleChecked = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.checked, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert("El formulario se ha enviado"); }; return ( <>
